scripts.build: npm run build:html && npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:favicon
scripts.build:css: npm run compile:scss && npm run build:post:css
scripts.build:html: mkdir -p build && pug < src/index.pug > build/index.html --pretty --basedir src
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p build/assets/javascripts && browserify src/assets/javascripts/application.js -t babelify --outfile build/assets/javascripts/application.js && echo 'done'
scripts.build:compressed: npm run build && npm run build:inliner && npm run build:html-minifier
scripts.build:inliner: npm run build && inliner build/index.html --skip-absolute-urls > build/tmp && node tasks/fix-inliner-filter.js && mv build/tmp build/index.html
scripts.build:html-minifier: html-minifier build/index.html --collapse-whitespace --minify-css --minify-js > build/tmp && mv build/tmp build/index.html
scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run server
scripts.start: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run server' 'npm run watch:css' 'npm run watch:html' 'npm run watch:js'
